Package network.packets

Interface Event

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
CollectTransactionsEvent, ConfirmBlockEvent, ConfirmTransactionEvent, DeliverLatestBlockEvent, DeliverTransactionsEvent, FixtureEvent, FixtureEvent, GetLatestBlockEvent, HelloEvent, Pull, PullResp, Push, PushResp, ReadyEvent, StopStartEvent, SubmitBlockEvent, SubmitTransactionEvent, ValidateBlockEvent, ValidateTransactionEvent
public interface Event extends Serializable
The Event interface is a base interface for the events that the nodes will communicate with each other through.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    actionPerformed(BaseNode hostNode)
    Should be activated by the event host node in order for the event to take action This method should be called in the event host node by calling event.actionPerformed(this)
    String
    logMessage()
    This method is used for log purpose.
    int
    size()
    Getter of the size in bytes.

  • Method Details

    • actionPerformed

      boolean actionPerformed(BaseNode hostNode)
      Should be activated by the event host node in order for the event to take action This method should be called in the event host node by calling event.actionPerformed(this)
      Parameters:
      hostNode - an instance of the host node in order to perform the event action. Please note that this parameter is of the type BaseNode. Therefore, in order to access the node params and methods, you should down cast the node into your special node class
      Returns:
      True if action was performed successfully. False otherwise

    • logMessage

      String logMessage()
      This method is used for log purpose. It will be activated by the simulator to log the event during simulation.
      Returns:
      a string that represents the log message of the event.

    • size

      int size()
      Getter of the size in bytes.
      Returns:
      size returns length of payload event in bytes.
